paragraphs.text: Connecticut Supreme Court saves teen's life.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: The Justices of the Connecticut Supreme Court took over parenting duties of a cancer-stricken teenager Thursday
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In so doing, they surely saved her life
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: At the conclusion of oral arguments, the high court took just minutes to determined that state officials were right to take custody of the girl known in court documents only as "Cassandra C " and force her to undergo life-saving treatment
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: No thanks to her mother
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Jackie Fortin had encouraged her 17-year-old daughter's desire to refuse chemotherapy

paragraphs.text: She naively pronounced,"my daughter is not going to die."
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: As if wishing it could make it come true
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: Sadly, both mother and daughter were wrong

paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Cassandra has advanced Hodgkin's lymphoma
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: which attacks and consumes the body's immune system

paragraphs.text: Yet, the teenager refused, saying she did not want to "poison" her body with chemo

paragraphs.text: How does that make sense to a rational mind?

paragraphs.text: Let's employ Cassandra's own tortured terminology and logic
paragraphs.label: other

paragraphs.text: Does she not realize that her body is already being poisoned by the rapidly multiplying cancer in her lymph system?

paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.label: statistics

paragraphs.text: Chemotherapy can save her
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Chemicals are introduced into the diseased body to attack the cancer cells
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: The cancer which is ravaging Cassandra's body surely is
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: If
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: by using the term "poison," Cassandra means she does not want to endure the side effects of nausea, vomiting, hair loss and exhaustion cond
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: she is being myopic
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The final stages of untreated lymphoma are far more extreme and painful
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Cassandra's disdain for the treatment that will likely save her young life is, perhaps, the best evidence that she was not mature enough to make a wise and informed decision on her own
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: But then again, neither was her mother
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Which is why the state of Connecticut stepped in
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As an adult, Fortin, is presumed to be competent under the law to make decisions for her daughter, a minor
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: However
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Fortin's aberrant judgment in rejecting the treatment that could save Cassandra's life and her concomitant belief that her daughter would somehow, miraculously, not succumb to an insidious, fatal illness... called that legal presumption into serious doubt
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: There is also evidence that Fortin ignored obvious signs of her daughter's malignant disease at an early stage, failed to seek prompt and continuing medical attention, and has been unduly influencing Cassandra's negative reaction to treatment
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The court records suggest a domineering mother with an abiding distrust of medicine, and a daughter fearful of running afoul of her mother's wishes
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: To deny a child beneficial, life-sustaining treatment constitutes child neglect
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: States have a duty to protect children from abuse and neglect
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Courts rarely hesitate to step in where a child's life is in danger
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Thus
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the state was correct to intervene
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: and
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the lower court was equally correct to remove the mother as unfit
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Fortunately, the Connecticut Supreme Court agreed and did the right thing
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Time is on Cassandra's side
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The fact that she is 9 months away from turning 18 years old may, in the end, have saved her life
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It gave the high court an excuse to adhere strictly to the law as it relates to protecting minors
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Those 9 months will also give doctors valuable time to complete her therapy and give her a new chance at a full and happy life
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As for her mother, Jackie Fortin?
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: She will have ample time to wrestle with her conscience
